item.title: Publications

item.title: Education
item.description: Academia Ph.D., Embedded Computing (2017) Åbo Akademi University, FI MSc., Embedded Computing (2012) Åbo Akademi University, FI BSc., Electrical Engineering (2007) Bahir Dar University, ET Teaching Big Data Platforms, Main Teaching Assistant (2020) University of Helsinki, Computer Science Department, FI Concurrent Programming, Main Teaching Assistant (2019) Aalto University, Computer Science Department, FI Multimedia Algorithms and Implementation, Teaching Assistant (2013) Åbo Akademi University, Embedded Systems Lab, FI Trainings Pouta Cloud: Practical Cloud Computing Course, Trainer (2021)

item.title: Projects
item.description: Projects EOSC-Nordic: a project that aims to facilitate the coordination of European Open Science Cloud (EOSC). (2022) EOSC-Nordic, EU Singpro: a project that aims to merge Big Data platforms, machine learning and data analytics methodologies with process planning and scheduling optimization technologies. (2020) Academy of Finland, FI EIT BDExp: a project having as main goal the development of a viable business model for EASYTRANS, an efficient media transcoding platform.

item.title: About
item.description: My interests lie at the intersection between computing and data-intensive applications. I explore ways of efficiently utilizing computing platforms with specialized hardware like GPUs for deep learning, video processing, and big data analytics. Lately, I have been working with several researchers on their computing environment needs, designing, developing, and assisting them on how to efficiently utilize HPC and Cloud platforms with specialized hardware like GPUs. I have also been involved in European projects related to federated machine learning and workflow engines 1 2.
